original_text: Because I serve the Lord, I am here in prison. I really want you to live as God's own people should live. God has called you to come to him. He has chosen you to be his own people.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 안에서 갇힌 내가 너희를 권하노니 너희가 부르심을 받은 일에 합당하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: I really want you to live
as God's own people should live
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 백성으로서 마땅히 살아야 할 삶으로

sentences.original_text: God has called you to come to him
He has chosen you to be his own people
